function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Raw sewage samples collected from multiple WWTPs in densely populated areas.","Impact":"Potential for the presence of contagious diseases in the sewage samples.","Mitigation":"Ensuring proper handling and treatment of sewage samples to minimize the risk of contamination.","Technologies":"Biological safety cabinets, heat treatment, and PEG-dextran method for sample concentration.","People":"Laboratory personnel, public health professionals, residents of the served areas.","Owner":"Laboratory personnel, public health professionals."}]}
